item.title: Poker_game
item.description: Alex Westâ€™s Blog - poker_game.py - Worded Version The parameters for the poker_game.py in our first week assignments it states the game, poker, must be created with the ability to accept an argument representing the number of players involved in the game, sort the cards, and be able to run while following the rules of the game. Over the time given for the project I was able to create a game more similar to a game of blackjack using this logic :
